about_the_game:
"Toad's Soul Hopper" is a hopping action game where the dependable scientist Toad from "Goonya Monster" makes his mark.

His fellow Busters have been enlarged by the mad scientist, Anemone's prank. To save them, Toad jumps into action with his custom-made hopping machine, the "Soul Hopper"!

...Jumping to save friends?

◆ Easy Controls?
Toad on his hopper is constantly bouncing. Press the button as he lands to charge power, then release it to make a big jump, adjusting the angle while charging.

◆ Bouncing, rebounding, falling...
If Toad's body or the side of the hopper hits a wall or the ground, he'll rebound. One moment of carelessness can lead to a fall and a familiar view below.

◆ A treacherous path
Platforms may collapse or catch fire, hindering your ascent.

◆ Can you see the summit?
Compete for the fastest time to the top with the local rankings, which store the top 10 scores. Aim higher than your past self!

short_description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! "Toad's Soul Hopper" is hopping action game where you aim for the top from bottom to top! Will he soar into action with weapons in hand to stop Anemone's mischief and save his friends?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
